subtasks.description: Fix act() warnings in src/components/ui/accordion/accordion.stories.tsx. The test passes but has act() warnings from Framer Motion's AnimatePresence component used within Radix UI Accordion. The warnings occur because state updates in the Presence component aren't wrapped in act(). Consider using waitFor or adding act() wrappers around interactions that trigger accordion animations. Read ./tmp/tests/accordion.stories.log for full details. Run 'VITEST_STORYBOOK=true npx vitest run src/components/ui/accordion/accordion.stories.tsx' to verify fixes.

Fix test issues in src/components/ui/avatar/avatar.stories.tsx. Read the error log at ./tmp/tests/avatar.stories.log. If there are act() warnings, wrap state updates in act() or use waitFor/findBy queries. If SDUI view is not loading, ensure the component is properly registered and the render() function handles the avatar spec correctly. Do not disable any tests. Run 'VITEST_STORYBOOK=true npx vitest run src/components/ui/avatar/avatar.stories.tsx' to verify fixes.

Fix act() warnings in src/components/ui/dialog/dialog.stories.tsx. Similar to accordion, the dialog uses Radix UI's Presence component in portals which triggers act() warnings during test execution. The warnings happen when dialog state changes trigger animations. Consider using waitFor for async operations or wrapping interactions in act(). Read ./tmp/tests/dialog.stories.log for details. Run 'VITEST_STORYBOOK=true npx vitest run src/components/ui/dialog/dialog.stories.tsx' to verify fixes.

Fix test failure in src/components/blocks/features/features.stories.tsx - Tabbed Categories story. Test fails because it can't find 'Enterprise Security' text. The issue is that a different tab (Performance) is active by default instead of showing all features. Either update the test to click the correct tab first or adjust the initial state. Read ./tmp/tests/features.stories.log for the specific error. Run 'VITEST_STORYBOOK=true npx vitest run src/components/blocks/features/features.stories.tsx' to verify fixes.
